alert.note: Alert for Barry; Howell; McDonald; Oregon; Ozark; Stone; Taney (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 22 at 2:31AM CST until February 24 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH... .Mixed wintry precipitation will impact portions of southern Missouri from Wednesday afternoon through Thursday. Freezing rain could cause ice accumulations ranging from one quarter to one half of an inch over far southern Missouri. Additional sleet and snow accumulations of up to an inch will also be possible. ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy mixed wintry precipitation likely. Total ice accumulations ranging from one quarter to one half of an inch. Additional sleet and snow accumulations of around 1 inch will also be possible. * WHERE...Far southern Missouri. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Some power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible at times as roads become slick. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday evening and Thursday morning commutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
